OOC: Are Windlord and Aerotaur on that pod?

Vlad was still running when he came in weapon range of the pod. He 
stopped and checked his sensors.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Pod::
> 
> The scanning process ended, but the pod's weak distress signal  
> continued 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > In the sky, the red streak caught the Khan's eye. He zoomed to see 
> it 
> > better.
> > 
> > Vlad: What is that? It seems to be a capsule or a projectile of 
> some 
> > kind... I will go and investigate.
> > 
> > Transforming to mech mode, he started running towards where his 
> > systems told him the object would fall.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Pod::
> > > 
> > > A pod fell from the sky and landed some miles from Tripedocus 
> base. 
> > A 
> > > distress signal appeared, but so weak that just the nearest base 
> > > could caught it, soon and the scanning process begun.
